name: Enzy Carboplus
description: Enzy Carboplus is a naturally heat-stable combination of xylanase and β-glucanase for poultry and pigs. Approved in the EU for fattening chickens, pullets, turkeys and piglets, ENZY Carboplus improves feed conversion and thus effectively reduces feed costs with constant animal performance. ENZY Carboplus is one of the few NSPase products that is heat-stable up to 90°C even without a coating.
